options.explain:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Attack/Movement Speed +4% and Casting Speed +6% per party member
- For parties of 1, a 30% chance of Lightning Explosion on enemies when attacking
options.explainDetail:
Dragon's Authority is activated when you enter a dungeon, applying the following effects.
- Attack/Movement Speed +4% and Casting Speed +6% per party member (Max Stacks: 4)
- For parties of 1, a 30% chance of Lightning Explosion on enemies when attacking (Cooldown: 4 sec. Inflicts 500% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)

options.explain:
When HP reaches 0, casts Hero's Spirit buff, applying the following effects.
- All HP healing effects negated
- Incoming damage consumes MP instead of HP. Character dies if MP reaches 0.
- MP -2% every sec.
options.explainDetail:
When HP reaches 0, casts Hero's Spirit buff, applying the following effects. (Cooldown: 300 sec.)
- All HP healing effects negated
- Incoming damage consumes MP instead of HP. Character dies if MP reaches 0.
- MP -2% every sec.

options.explain: Attacks create a 30% chance of applying a randomly selected effect.
options.explainDetail:
Attacks create a 30% chance of applying one of the following 3 effects. (Cooldown: 3 sec. Max Stacks: 1. Inflicts 100% of total Damage Value, regardless of enemy Def.)
- Casts Horizontal Cube on a randomly selected enemy in 200 px. Damage Value +7034.
- Casts Horizontal Cube on up to 3 randomly selected enemies in 300 px. Damage Value +7815.
- Casts Horizontal Cube on up to 5 randomly selected enemies in 500 px. Damage Value +8597.
